subtopics.title: Java Basics
subtopics.description: Basic syntax, data types, variables, and operators in Java

subtopics.title: Control Flow
subtopics.description: If statements, loops (for, while, do-while), and switch statements

subtopics.title: Methods and Functions
subtopics.description: Declaring and invoking methods, return types, parameters, and method overloading

subtopics.title: Classes and Objects
subtopics.description: Defining classes, creating objects, constructors, and class members

subtopics.title: Inheritance
subtopics.description: Extending classes, super keyword, method overriding, and superclasses and subclasses

subtopics.title: Arrays
subtopics.description: Declaration, initialization, accessing elements, and array manipulation

subtopics.title: Lists
subtopics.description: ArrayList, LinkedList, List interface, and list operations

subtopics.title: Maps
subtopics.description: HashMap, TreeMap, LinkedHashMap, key-value pairs, and map operations

subtopics.title: Sets
subtopics.description: HashSet, TreeSet, LinkedHashSet, set operations, and set intersection/union

subtopics.title: Queues and Stacks
subtopics.description: Queue interface, Stack class, FIFO/LIFO, enqueue/dequeue, push/pop operations

subtopics.title: Polymorphism
subtopics.description: Method overloading, method overriding, compile-time and runtime polymorphism

subtopics.title: Encapsulation
subtopics.description: Access modifiers, data hiding, getters and setters, and information hiding

subtopics.title: Abstraction
subtopics.description: Abstract classes, abstract methods, interfaces, and implementing interfaces

subtopics.title: Static Keyword
subtopics.description: Static methods, static variables, static block, and static import

subtopics.title: Final Keyword
subtopics.description: Final variables, final methods, final classes, and immutability

subtopics.title: Try-Catch Blocks
subtopics.description: Handling exceptions with try-catch, multiple catch blocks, and nested try-catch

subtopics.title: Throw and Throws
subtopics.description: Throwing exceptions, creating custom exceptions, and using the throws clause

subtopics.title: Finally Block
subtopics.description: Cleanup operations, executing code regardless of exception, and resource management in finally block

subtopics.title: Checked vs. Unchecked Exceptions
subtopics.description: Differences between checked exceptions (compile-time) and unchecked exceptions (runtime)

subtopics.title: Reading and Writing Files
subtopics.description: File input and output streams, reading/writing text and binary files

subtopics.title: File Class Methods
subtopics.description: File class, create/delete files, check file existence, and file permissions

subtopics.title: Serialization
subtopics.description: Object serialization, ObjectOutputStream, ObjectInputStream, and Serializable interface

subtopics.title: Buffered Readers and Writers
subtopics.description: Efficient reading and writing, BufferedReader, BufferedWriter, and handling large files

subtopics.title: Threads
subtopics.description: Creating threads, extending Thread class, implementing Runnable interface, thread lifecycle

subtopics.title: Synchronization
subtopics.description: Synchronized keyword, synchronized methods, synchronized blocks, and thread safety

subtopics.title: Locks and Conditions
subtopics.description: ReentrantLock, Condition interface, tryLock(), lockInterruptibly(), and thread management

subtopics.title: Executors Framework
subtopics.description: Executor interfaces, ThreadPoolExecutor, ExecutorService, and managing thread execution

subtopics.title: Collection Interface
subtopics.description: List, Set, Queue interfaces, add/remove operations, and common methods

subtopics.title: ArrayList and LinkedList
subtopics.description: Differences, performance, when to use each, and iteration operations

subtopics.title: HashMap and LinkedHashMap
subtopics.description: Key-value pairs, iteration, retrieving values, and map methods

subtopics.title: HashSet and TreeSet
subtopics.description: Unique elements, sorting, navigating through elements, and set operations
